title: Crystal and Lockjaw token set Marvel Crisis Protocol - funnymonkeythings
author: Name
description: Crystal and Lockjaw token set matching Marvel Crisis Protocol. The set includes 11 tokens. Each token measures approximately 20mm.
cleaned_text: Crystal and Lockjaw token set matching Marvel Crisis Protocol In Stock Crystal and Lockjaw token set perfect for Marvel Crisis Protocol miniatures game. The set includes 11 tokens: 1 Lockjaw token in white with details painted in ligh blue. 3 stun tokens in translucent blue with details in white 1 bleed token in translucent red with details in white 3 incinerate tokens in translucent orange 3 slow tokens in translucent orange Details are laser engraved and hand painted to ensure their perfect visibility. SIZE: Each token measures aproximately 20 mm. Manufactured in high quality acrylic, 3
